title: enadu uLLamE
sahitya:
enadu uLLamE niraindadinba veLLamE
yadu vIranai nanda kumAranai ninaindu


anupallavi

  malarE iruvizhi pankaja malarE tirumukhamum
malarE irukaram tAmarai malarE tiruvaDigaL
manahAsamum tavazhnda sundara mukhAra vindam ninai


caraNam    annai tandhai guruvum avan arum tuNai nava nidhiyum avan
mIrA prabu giridhara gOpAlanai varadanai ninaidorum
